description: The Rubber Tree graphic is inspired by 1970s surfboard lams and celebrates the use of 85% Yulex® natural rubber in our wetsuits. It's fitting that the artwork is screen-printed on Patagonia’s lowest carbon footprint T-shirt made with 100% recycled fabrics. By utilizing fabric scraps and recycled bottles, we reduce our reliance on virgin raw materials. Made in a Fair Trade Certified™ factory.
name: Patagonia Rubber Tree Mark Responsibili-Tee - Mens
